features.name: profile
features.title: Let them know you
features.description: Flex your best qualities on your profile. Show your interests. Let it scream, “I’m the best fur parent in the whole world!”.

subFeatures.title: Stand Out with rich Profile
subFeatures.description: Pick your best photos and share more details about yourself. Describe your hobbies and showcase your answers to optional questioners too. Give them hints that makes you a perfect fit to be a fur parent.

subFeatures.title: Get Verified
subFeatures.description: Gain more likes by securing a selfie photo and valid ID of yourself to boost your reliability. The more realistic, the more catchy. It will just take a few minutes and you are ready for adoption dating.

features.name: match
features.title: Match with your perfect buddy
features.description: Swipe to the right for the pet you like until you get your match.

subFeatures.title: Discover people
subFeatures.description: Filter out your most preffered pet out from millions out there and be match with the highest possible results. Remember the more specific, the more accurate.

subFeatures.title: Swipe that catch!
subFeatures.description: Collect and select, swipe right or react heart to put them on your favorite   list. You can always swipe left too if the results don’t match your ideal bestfriend.

features.name: chat
features.title: Get to know them
features.description: Chat with the keeper of your match pet, and learn more about them.

subFeatures.title: Chat and get a glimpse of your match
subFeatures.description: Be the first one to show that moves and get acquainted right away with your future bestfriend. See if it’s getting the same vibe and chills you’re in.

subFeatures.title: Arrange a meet up
subFeatures.description: Arrange the best schedule and set a venue to meet your soon to be pet. If lucky enough, some shelters provide home and delivery so you won’t worry about that bulky cage along the ride.

features.name: adopt
features.title: Adopt
features.description: Adopt, don’t shop. Make a deal with the pet keeper, and become a certified fur parent.

subFeatures.title: Process Requirements
subFeatures.description: Paperless uploading of requirements, so quick and no hassle when it comes to extra baggage when meeting up with your new pet.

subFeatures.title: Share your adopting journey
subFeatures.description: Submit us the story of how you met your furry best friend and help other pet lovers discover the joys of pet adoption.

summariesHeading: Join the network and be a Fur Parent
summariesSubHeading: Adopting a pet is a transformative and exciting experience, but it can be daunting at times. Rest assured that Swipet will be by your side in everything and will match you with your best friend.

summaries.name: petparent
summaries.title: Number of Potencial Pet Parents Registered

tipsSubHeading: Give your story a little whirl and make good impressions last.
tipsFirstPar: In order to adopt your preferred pet, you need to be able to continue a half-hearted and decent conversation. Dating app is designed to be able to talk to people.
tipsSecPar: The possibility of adoption is as good as a conversation, so you need to make sure thatthe opening line is eye-catching.
tips: Keep The Conversation Going With Open Questions
Remind Them That Their Fear of Commitment Is a Non-Issue
testimonialSubHeading: Help find these pets new home and refer this app to your friends or you can become a Swipey - a contributor to the adoption community and be one of our sponsors.
